WAY TO GO, CHUBBY!
WITH YOUR HELP WE FOUND THE FILES OF
"".
YOU CAN CHECK THEM OUT IN THE LABORATORY.

NOW YOU JUST NEED TO DEFEAT EL PIX. HE’S
HIDING IN THE BIG SNOW STATUE - GO GET HIM!
TIP: Game too slow? Best performance with Microsoft Internet Explorer®.
YOU CAN CLIMB ICE FORMATIONS TO DISCOVER HIDDEN TREASURES.
COLLECT ALL THE ICE CRYSTALS IN THE ADVENT CALENDAR TO UNLOCK A SPECIAL BONUS STRAIGHT OUT OF SNOWDRIFTLAND.
JUMP ON TOP OF YOUR OPPONENTS TO KNOCK THEM OUT.
YOU CAN SLIDE DOWN SLOPES BY PRESSING THE DOWN ARROW.
THE STOLEN GAME FILES CAN BE FOUND IN A CHEST TOWARDS THE END OF THE LEVELS.
IF YOU KEEP THE WALK BUTTON PRESSED, CHUBBY WILL SOON START TO RUN, ALLOWING HIM TO JUMP HIGHER.
IN SOME SITUATIONS YOU CAN PROTECT CHUBBY FROM ATTACKS BY PRESSING THE DUCK BUTTON.
CHUBBY'S ENERGY LEVEL IS SHOWN BY THE NUMBER OF HEARTS. YOU CAN GIVE HIM MORE ENERGY BY FINDING THE HEARTS HIDDEN IN THE LEVELS.
